law.catch_line: Authority to administer oaths and to act as notary.

text.section: The signature without seal of any such person, together with the title of his or her office, shall be prima facie evidence of the person's authority.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 140, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 53. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 75, effective July 1, 1954.
